value.title: Give external users access to your Azure Analysis Services server
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at how you can provide access to your Azure Analysis Services server to external users. value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how the Power BI data region is selected. This is the what you see when you go to About Power BI and see "Your data is stored in". You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft

value.title: Row-Level Security in Power BI - Revisited
